Sentencas: In recent years, the potential of Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technologies as energy conversion devices with high efficiency and zero-carbon emissions has been underestimated, where high fuel utilization plays a crucial role.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: Although the SOFC system with anode off -gas single recirculation has received much attention as a means to increase fuel utilization, this problem is not thoroughly addressed.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: To overcome this limitation, this paper proposes a novel SOFC system concept featuring anode off -gas dual recirculation, designed to maximize fuel utilization up to the theoretical limit of 100%.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: This innovative approach inherently eliminates carbon dioxide emissions through an integrated carbon capture process, thereby maintaining systematic carbon balance.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: A comparative analysis among the novel dual recirculation system, traditional single -pass, and other anode off -gas recirculation systems, reveals that the proposed system outperforms existing configurations.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: It achieves electrical and overall combined heat and power efficiencies of 49.6% and 85.7%, respectively, even after accounting for the energy required for carbon capture.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: This represents a 21.5% increase in electric efficiency over the single recirculation system, with a six -fold increase in tail -gas CO2 concentration, reaching 26.3%.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: The study categorizes the four analyzed systems into open or closed based on whether the anode off -gas is directly discharged into the environment.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: Systematic investigations into carbon deposition potential, fuel utilization, flow rate, operating voltage, carbon capture ratio, and condensation temperature disclose distinct patterns between open and closed systems.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency

Sentencas: The closed configurations exhibit superior performance, suggesting they are more suitable for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Novel SOFC system concept with anode off-gas dual recirculation: A pathway to zero carbon emission and high energy efficiency
